modules.name: Graphics.Canvas
modules.comments:
This module defines foreign types and functions for working with the 2D
Canvas API.

declarations.comments: The `Canvas` effect denotes computations which read/write from/to the canvas.
declarations.title: Canvas

declarations.comments: A canvas HTML element.
declarations.title: CanvasElement

declarations.comments: A 2D graphics context.
declarations.title: Context2D

declarations.comments: An image data object, used to store raster data outside the canvas.
declarations.title: ImageData

declarations.comments: An array of pixel data.
declarations.title: CanvasPixelArray

declarations.comments: Opaque object for drawing elements and things to the canvas.
declarations.title: CanvasImageSource

declarations.comments: Opaque object describing a gradient.
declarations.title: CanvasGradient

declarations.comments: Wrapper for asynchronously loading a image file by path and use it in callback, e.g. drawImage
declarations.title: withImage

declarations.comments: Get a canvas element by ID, or `Nothing` if the element does not exist.
declarations.title: getCanvasElementById

declarations.comments: Get the 2D graphics context for a canvas element.
declarations.title: getContext2D

declarations.comments: Get the canvas width in pixels.
declarations.title: getCanvasWidth

declarations.comments: Get the canvas height in pixels.
declarations.title: getCanvasHeight

declarations.comments: Set the canvas width in pixels.
declarations.title: setCanvasWidth

declarations.comments: Set the canvas height in pixels.
declarations.title: setCanvasHeight

declarations.comments: Canvas dimensions (width and height) in pixels.
declarations.title: Dimensions

declarations.comments: Get the canvas dimensions in pixels.
declarations.title: getCanvasDimensions

declarations.comments: Set the canvas dimensions in pixels.
declarations.title: setCanvasDimensions

declarations.comments: Create a data URL for the current canvas contents
declarations.title: canvasToDataURL

declarations.comments: Set the current line width.
declarations.title: setLineWidth

declarations.comments: Set the current fill style/color.
declarations.title: setFillStyle

declarations.comments: Set the current stroke style/color.
declarations.title: setStrokeStyle

declarations.comments: Set the current shadow color.
declarations.title: setShadowColor

declarations.comments: Set the current shadow blur radius.
declarations.title: setShadowBlur

declarations.comments: Set the current shadow x-offset.
declarations.title: setShadowOffsetX

declarations.comments: Set the current shadow y-offset.
declarations.title: setShadowOffsetY

declarations.comments: Enumerates the different types of line cap.
declarations.title: LineCap

declarations.comments: Set the current line cap type.
declarations.title: setLineCap

declarations.comments: Enumerates the different types of alpha composite operations.
declarations.title: Composite

declarations.comments: Set the current composite operation.
declarations.title: setGlobalCompositeOperation

declarations.comments: Set the current global alpha level.
declarations.title: setGlobalAlpha

declarations.comments: Begin a path object.
declarations.title: beginPath

declarations.comments: Stroke the current object.
declarations.title: stroke

declarations.comments: Fill the current object.
declarations.title: fill

declarations.comments: Clip to the current object.
declarations.title: clip

declarations.comments: Move the path to the specified coordinates, drawing a line segment.
declarations.title: lineTo

declarations.comments: Move the path to the specified coordinates, without drawing a line segment.
declarations.title: moveTo

declarations.comments: Close the current path.
declarations.title: closePath

declarations.comments:
A convenience function for drawing a stroked path.

For example:

```purescript
strokePath ctx $ do
  moveTo ctx 10.0 10.0
  lineTo ctx 20.0 20.0
  lineTo ctx 10.0 20.0
  closePath ctx
```
declarations.title: strokePath

declarations.comments:
A convenience function for drawing a filled path.

For example:

```purescript
fillPath ctx $ do
  moveTo ctx 10.0 10.0
  lineTo ctx 20.0 20.0
  lineTo ctx 10.0 20.0
  closePath ctx
```
declarations.title: fillPath

declarations.comments:
A type representing an arc object:

- The center coordinates `x` and `y`,
- The radius `r`,
- The starting and ending angles, `start` and `end`.
declarations.title: Arc

declarations.comments: Render an arc object.
declarations.title: arc

declarations.comments:
A type representing a rectangle object:

- The top-left corner coordinates `x` and `y`,
- The width and height `w` and `h`.
declarations.title: Rectangle

declarations.comments: Render a rectangle.
declarations.title: rect

declarations.comments: Fill a rectangle.
declarations.title: fillRect

declarations.comments: Stroke a rectangle.
declarations.title: strokeRect

declarations.comments: Clear a rectangle.
declarations.title: clearRect

declarations.comments:
An object representing a scaling transform:

- The scale factors in the `x` and `y` directions, `scaleX` and `scaleY`.
declarations.title: ScaleTransform

declarations.comments: Apply a scaling transform.
declarations.title: scale

declarations.comments: Apply a rotation.
declarations.title: rotate

declarations.comments:
An object representing a translation:

- The translation amounts in the `x` and `y` directions, `translateX` and `translateY`.
declarations.title: TranslateTransform

declarations.comments: Apply a translation
declarations.title: translate

declarations.comments: An object representing a general transformation as a homogeneous matrix.
declarations.title: Transform

declarations.comments: Apply a general transformation.
declarations.title: transform

declarations.comments: Enumerates types of text alignment.
declarations.title: TextAlign

declarations.comments: Get the current text alignment.
declarations.title: textAlign

declarations.comments: Set the current text alignment.
declarations.title: setTextAlign

declarations.comments:
Text metrics:

- The text width in pixels.
declarations.title: TextMetrics

declarations.comments: Get the current font.
declarations.title: font

declarations.comments: Set the current font.
declarations.title: setFont

declarations.comments: Fill some text.
declarations.title: fillText

declarations.comments: Stroke some text.
declarations.title: strokeText

declarations.comments: Measure some text.
declarations.title: measureText

declarations.comments: Save the current context.
declarations.title: save

declarations.comments: Restore the previous context.
declarations.title: restore

declarations.comments:
A convenience function: run the action, preserving the existing context.

For example, outside this block, the fill style is preseved:

```purescript
withContext ctx $ do
  setFillStyle "red" ctx
  ...
```
declarations.title: withContext

declarations.comments: Get image data for a portion of the canvas.
declarations.title: getImageData

declarations.comments: Set image data for a portion of the canvas.
declarations.title: putImageDataFull

declarations.comments: Get image data for a portion of the canvas.
declarations.title: putImageData

declarations.comments: Create an image data object.
declarations.title: createImageData

declarations.comments: Create a copy of an image data object.
declarations.title: createImageDataCopy

declarations.comments: Get the width of an image data object in pixels.
declarations.title: getImageDataWidth

declarations.comments: Get the height of an image data object in pixels.
declarations.title: getImageDataHeight

declarations.comments: Get the pixel data array from an image data object.
declarations.title: getImageDataPixelArray

declarations.comments:
A type representing a linear gradient.
 -  Starting point coordinates: (`x0`, `y0`)
 -  Ending point coordinates: (`x1`, `y1`)
declarations.title: LinearGradient

declarations.comments: Create a linear CanvasGradient.
declarations.title: createLinearGradient

declarations.comments:
A type representing a radial gradient.
 -  Starting circle center coordinates: (`x0`, `y0`)
 -  Starting circle radius: `r0`
 -  Ending circle center coordinates: (`x1`, `y1`)
 -  Ending circle radius: `r1`
declarations.title: RadialGradient

declarations.comments: Create a radial CanvasGradient.
declarations.title: createRadialGradient

declarations.comments: Add a single color stop to a CanvasGradient.
declarations.title: addColorStop

declarations.comments: Set the Context2D fillstyle to the CanvasGradient.
declarations.title: setGradientFillStyle

declarations.comments:
A type representing a quadratic Bézier curve.
 - Bézier control point: (`cpx`, `cpy`)
 - Ending point coordinates: (`x`, `y`)
declarations.title: QuadraticCurve

declarations.comments: Draw a quadratic Bézier curve.
declarations.title: quadraticCurveTo

declarations.comments:
A type representing a cubic Bézier curve.
 - First Bézier control point: (`cp1x`, `cp1y`)
 - Second Bézier control point: (`cp2x`, `cp2y`)
 - Ending point: (`x`, `y`)
declarations.title: BezierCurve

declarations.comments: Draw a cubic Bézier curve.
declarations.title: bezierCurveTo
